Things I will and wont do:

Not sure if something is off limits? Check here!
* Irrespective of this list I deem the right to decline any commision I deem innapropriate

I will draw: I wont draw
  • Anthros
  • Humans
  • Tasteful Gore
  • Fanart
  • OC's
  • Tasteful Alcohol Use
  • Political Commentary / Hate Iconography
  • Characters without permission to use them
  • Immoral / niche fetish or sexual content
  • Drug use / Paraphernalia
  • Cigarretes, Cigars, Vapes
  • Sexual / Suggestive artwork FOR or OF underage individuals.

Other Conditions:

I also offer a variety of other artwork and services, including (but not limited to): Digital Lineless artwork, light 3d modelling, Logo Design, 18+ artwork, and terraria modded vanity sets.
These commision options are available on a commision to commision basis. Please direct inquiries to my discord, or email (sushidev2@gmail.com).

Ready to commision me?:
